page.title: 19Hatfield Hth. Police Station
page.content: A group from our school visited the police station and interviewed one of the constables. We were amazed to find that their area was as big as 82 square miles and there were five constables and one sergeant but only one police car. We were asked to name a month from this year and we found that in that month there were 119 telephone messages to the police which included burglar alarms going off, an electrical sub station blowing up and domestic disputes. Also in that month there were 8 crimes reported; 5 thefts, 2 burglaries and 1 for handling stolen property. The police work various 8 hour shifts from 6 a.m. until 2 a.m. The four hours in the early hours of the morning are covered by a Harlow patrol. A policeman's equipment include a notebook, warrant card, truncheon and steel hand-cuffs.
